message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a steal at this price, if I do say so myself.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I've done some research and I think that's a fair price for this product.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your research. However, I'm still not willing to part with the product for $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $12500. It's a great compromise, if you ask me!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $11000. I think that's a fair price for this product.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go down to $11000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $12250. It's a small increase, but I think it's still a fair price for this product.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $10500. I think that's a fair price for this product, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.
